Glossary
  • AB: At Bats
  • R: Runs
  • H: Hits
  • 2B: Doubles
  • 3B: Triples
  • HR: Home Runs
  • RBI: Runs Batted In
  • SB: Stolen Bases
  • CS: Caught Stealing
  • BB: Walks
  • SO: Strikeouts
  • AVG: Batting Average
  • OBP: On Base Percentage
  • SLG: Slugging Percentage
  • OPS: OPS = OBP + SLG
  • WAR: Wins Above Replacement
